mapper.select: select * from production a, product b, qc q, defective d where a.product_id = b.product_id and a.production_id = q.production_id and q.qc_num = d.qc_num
select * from production a, product b, qc q, defective d where a.product_id = b.product_id and a.production_id = q.production_id and q.qc_num = d.qc_num and q.qc_num = #{qc_num}
select * from production a, product b, pr_complete c where a.product_id = b.product_id and a.production_id = c.production_id and a.production_id = #{production_id}
SELECT qc_num FROM qc ORDER BY qc_num DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: insert into qc (qc_num, qc_emp, qc_date, qc_qty, qc_status, production_id, total_defQty) values (#{qc_num}, #{qc_emp}, now(), #{qc_qty}, '완료', #{production_id}, #{total_defQty})
insert into defective (qc_num, def_code, def_qty,production_id) values (#{qc_num},#{def_code},#{def_qty},#{production_id})
mapper.update: update material set ma_qty = (ma_qty+(#{bt_qty}-#{bt_defQty})) where ma_name = '공병'
